content:
Inserting an annotation before the selection

By default, the text currently selected on the page will become the content of the annotation. For some elements this is not a suitable approach. A page beginning (pb) or a note would be typical examples. The editor supports this: if you add a class before to the annotation action button, TEI Publisher will not replace the text, but insert the new annotation right before the selection:

<paper-icon-button class="annotation-action before">...</paper-icon-button>
